column5: Hi all,  I have been looking for a heater to warm up my pop up shelter for a little while now.  Today I noticed that princess auto had the buddy heater advertised on sale on their website so I went into my local store to grab one after work.  I got there and found they had none of the ones I was looking for in stock only little buddy and big buddy units.  I was kind of disappointed until I noticed the price on the big buddy units $80 DOLLARS!  thats 109.99 off of regular price, and 12 dollars cheaper than the advertised price on the website for the smaller unit.  If anyone is looking for a heater, check your local Princess Auto store.  I don't know if all the stores have them on sale but my local (Barton st, Hamilton) does.  When I left just before close tonight they had 16-18 left in stock.   Ryan
GREAT DEAL...  have to go check now.  Wouldn't mind a spare
thanks buddy for the heads up
Too bad, the Mississauga location had it for 125. Would love to pick one up

Too bad, the Mississauga location had it for 125. Would love to pick one up You gents have your heaters mixed up....  Big buddy $133 vs normal buddy heater $91,  http://www.princessauto.com/pal/Radiant/4000-to-9000-BTU-Portable-Buddy-Heater/8270720.p  http://www.princessauto.com/pal/Radiant/4000-to-18000-BTU-Big-Buddy-Heater/8172462.p
Nope. Called both with SKU in hand. They are not 133..
The Barrie one has no little buddies left. Only big buddies. They also have the 3800 btu ones. 79 bucks. That should still be lots to keep me warm in my little hub.
bassassin,  I saw what the website advertised price is, that's what got me into the store.  Once there they were priced even lower, for $80.
133 is a good price, but 80 is a steal, awesome deal there
The one they had was like the cat. No heat control. I passed.

Thanks for the heads up on this amazing deal, I took a drive to my local store (Kitchener) and they were tagged at $96.94, but when I mentioned about price matching the Hamilton store I got it for $79.84. I paid more than that for my Little Buddy heater a few years back.

I too got one last night but upon further inspection, these are reconditioned units.  Minor scratches and not in the bag inside the box.. Don't really care too much so long as it works.  Oh ya I took it out of the box and just turned the dial to pilot and the pilot light lit up even though I havent even put any propane bottles in yet,  LOL.  It was also labeled at $133 but they let it go for $79 when I pressed them.  Mississauga store.  Still lots left  Dan
Did kitchener have lots?  It's a bit of a haul, but I might just do it.  Price is great!
Pretty sure mine was brand new from there. Was in a bag. Zero marks. Box was mint.
I picked up 2 last night, one for myself and one for a buddy. They look brand new to me...either way as long as they work it's all good.. What a great deal. There might have been a half dozen left..
Told my Dad about the deal today and he called the hamilton store to check stock, none left.  They had stock in mississauga and matched hamilton's price.
